keyword: how many calories are in a frozen yogurt
title: How Many Calories Are in a Frozen Yogurt?
meta_description: Learn how many calories are in a frozen yogurt serving, plus carbs, protein, fat, full nutrition facts, and preparation tweaks for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Frozen Yogurt?
assumptions: Plain, low-fat frozen yogurt; standard serving of 100 g (about 1/2 cup soft-serve).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, fat content, flavors, sweeteners, and serving size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 100 g serving of plain frozen yogurt contains about 130 kcal and 4 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a frozen yogurt serving?
faqs.a: About 130 kcal for a 100 g plain low-fat serving.

faqs.q: Is frozen yogurt lower in calories than ice cream?
faqs.a: Often yesâ€”frozen yogurt typically has 100-150 kcal per 100 g vs. 200+ for full-fat ice cream.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in frozen yogurt?
faqs.a: Around 25 g per 100 g serving, mostly from sugars.
Yes, about 4 g per 100 g from the yogurt base.

faqs.q: How do flavors affect calories in frozen yogurt?
faqs.a: Fruit flavors add minimal calories; chocolate or cookie dough can increase by 20-50 kcal per serving.
